What sorts of things are in the Oral Tor.text: Generally, we say that the Oral Torah contains the details of the mitzvos that Hashem chose not to put in the written Torah.

tokensOfLine.text: If so,
what is something you wouldn't find in the Oral Torah?

tokens.text: what is something you wouldn't find in the Oral Torah?

tokensOfLine.enclosingSubtopic: What sorts of things are in the Oral Torah?

tokensOfLine.text: If the Oral Torah is for details of mitzvos mentioned in the written Torah, then perhaps we wouldn't expect the Oral Torah to include any mitzvos or details of mitzvos that aren't mentioned in the written Torah.
Does the fact that the Oral Torah doesn't include mitzvos not written in the Torah help us formulate a question on our Mishnah?

Does the fact that things in the Mishnah.text: So, the Mishnah encodes the Oral Law which contains details of the things written in the written Torah.
